headline: RBC upgrades Church & Dwight given conservative guidance and Touchland deal
summary: Investing.com -- RBC Capital Markets upgraded Church & Dwight (NYSE:CHD) to Outperform from Sector Perform and raised its price target to $114 from $100, saying recent underperformance creates an attractive entry point and expressing renewed confidence following meetings with management.
